ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new retrofuturistic Ideology style, fitting for sci-fi stories.
This style category affects: - Simple Helmet - Flak Helmet - Power Armor Helmet - Longsword - Revolver - Autopistol - Machine pistol - Shotgun - Chain shotgun - LMG - Heavy SMG - Assault rifle - Sniper rifle - Minigun - Charge rifle - Charge lance - Column - Standing lamp - Stool - Dining Chair - Table (1x2) - Table (2x2) - Table (2x4) - Table (3x3) - Plant pot - Ritual ambience sound
Credits: Heavy inspiration was taken from early LEGO space sets, pieces and box art. komit.wav - Synth Sparkle, used as a ritual ambience sound and licensed under the creative commons 0 license. https://freesound.org/people/komit.wav/sounds/399294/
